text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi While @narendramodi kills off innocent civilians in Kashmir and uses #coronavirus as an excuse to crack down on more innocent people and put them in jail and unsafe environments you make it seem like he does nothing wrong and call yourself his best friend. Absolutely crazy.
